newsitem.title: USA: Dow opens lower, Nasdaq rises slightly.
newsitem.headline: Dow opens lower, Nasdaq rises slightly.

text.p: The Dow Jones Industrial Average opened lower on Monday, pulling back from last week's record-breaking run.
The Dow shed about 20 points to 7762 after gaining about 346 points last week.
Meanwhile, the Nasdaq composite gained about two points to 1425.
The long bond gained 5/32, its yield dipping to 6.71 percent. The Standard & Poor's futures index was off 0.25 to 903.20.
